definition: a breed of horse/variant of 歡|欢[huan1]
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
As You Like It, comedy by Shakespeare
As You Like It, comedy by Shakespeare

sentences.english: Not a trace of weariness, only happy.
sentences.chinese: 没有一丝倦意，只有满心欢喜。

sentences.english: And they were glad, and covenanted to give him money.
sentences.chinese: 他们欢喜，就约定给他银子。

sentences.english: Under the morning sun, a great happiness hovers in space.
sentences.chinese: 在晨日的照耀下，一股巨大的欢喜之情在空中翱翔。

sentences.english: Christmas is a time for gladness and rejoicing ...because there is no class.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是欢喜和快乐的时光，因为不用上课。

sentences.english: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
sentences.chinese: 你们义人当靠耶和华欢喜，称谢他可记念的圣名。

sentences.english: Since this was my first time to take the plane, I was filled with joy.
sentences.chinese: 因为这是我第一次坐飞机，所以我满心欢喜。

sentences.english: Every man looks at his wood-pile with a kind of affection.
sentences.chinese: 每一个人看见了他的柴火堆都非常欢喜。

sentences.english: He smiles when we express our adoration and gratitude to him.
sentences.chinese: 当我们崇拜仰慕他，他就欢喜。

sentences.english: When the young man went to college, he decided to try out for the football team as a "walk-on."
sentences.chinese: 转眼少年进了大学，决心拼进校队，跑龙套也欢喜。

sentences.english: 1O Lord , the king rejoices in your strength.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，王必因你的能力欢喜。

sentences.english: Into a spacious "home" high - wai whole heart happy.
sentences.chinese: 搬进了宽敞的“新家”，高炜满心欢喜。

sentences.english: The pentagrammatic sign as the infinitive of perfection—of the finite jouissance range.
sentences.chinese: 完美境界符号作为完美的无限，相对于欢喜的有限。

sentences.english: The flattening of underwear with pleasure is the job of the chambermaid.
sentences.chinese: 女服务员的工作就是满心欢喜地将内衣裤压平。

sentences.english: And you should be glad to go home, and to see him.
sentences.chinese: 你应该欢欢喜喜地回家去见他。

sentences.english: Li and Lin became quarrelsome lovers.
The news of Aunt Li's coming to see us threw all of us into ecstasy.
sentences.chinese: 李大婶要来看我们的消息使我们都欢喜得了不得。

definition: happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
one's whole heart/from the bottom of one's heart
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning
